FuncDef: This command configures an Ethernet 802.2 LLC SSAP value or range for an ingress SAP QoS policy match criterion.

ParaDef.Info: The 8-bit ssap match criteria value in hex. Values-0x00 to 0xFF (hex).
This is optional and can be used when specifying a range of ssap values to use as the match criteria. Values-0x00 to 0xFF.
